title: Castle of the walking dead
brief_description: Based on Edgar Allen Poe’s story “The Pit and the pendulum”, this ghastly story stars Christopher Lee as Count Regula, who has dismembered twelve virgins. After thrity five years, his indestructible servant puts him together again and hes back at his favourite hobby once more. If your passion is horrific movies - this one is gory enough to satisfy even the strongest need.
